name: Through The Woods (itch) (Master Krepta)
description:
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/through-woods

This game was created by Adam Keating and Brian Pajak in a weekend for Global Game Jam 2019 in Cleveland Ohio

DESCRIPTION:

Over the river, and through the woods, past the murderous trees and killer bees, back to home we go. This is a doom inspired FPS, about a brave child defending their cabin from vicious tree monsters. Using a super soaker and toy shotgun, defend against wave after wave of hostile trees. Keep your distance to avoid their brutal melee attack, but be prepared to dodge as they throw nests filled with angry wasps. Be on the lookout for useful power-ups hidden throughout the woods, and gather dropped loot quickly to stay in the fight.

CREDITS

Art design - Adam Keating 

Programming - Brian Pajak

Post processing effect courtesy of Pixalation Asset: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/pixe...
